project.description: Do a "platform" build from SVN. Do more testing than the matrix builds.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.5.0/jre/lib/i386/client:/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.5.0/jre/lib/i386:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH cd squawk-native
$HUDSON_HOME/bin/verifyBuildJars2
./d.sh clean ./d.sh copyphoneme ./d.sh ./d.sh -prod -mac -o2 rom -metadata -lnt cldc imp debugger
./d.sh map -cp:cldc/j2meclasses:imp/j2meclasses:debugger/j2meclasses squawk.suite rm squawk.suite.map ./d.sh genspec ./d.sh jvmenv ./d.sh systemproperties ./d.sh Mnemonics ./d.sh OPC ./d.sh OperandStackEffect ./d.sh Verifier ./squawk -h ./squawk -version $HUDSON_DIR/bin/runsmoketest.sh DELEGATING $HUDSON_DIR/bin/runiotests.sh
rm -rf tempdoc ./d.sh makeapi squawk.suite.api cldc/preprocessed:imp/preprocessed:debugger/preprocessed tempdoc
ls -l > sizereport.txt
mkdir tmp cp squawk squawk.suite squawk.suite.metadata tmp ./d.sh clean mv tmp/squawk tmp/squawk.suite tmp/squawk.suite.metadata . rmdir tmp ./d.sh clean
